search_wikipedia_page.name: search_wikipedia_page
search_wikipedia_page.description: Use the '/tools/bing/searchv2' API to search for the 'West African Vodun Wikipedia page' to find the URL of the page.

load_wikipedia_page_content.name: load_wikipedia_page_content
load_wikipedia_page_content.description: Use the '/tools/bing/load_pagev2' API with the URL obtained from the previous task and a query parameter set to 'Scopus citations' to load the relevant content of the West African Vodun Wikipedia page.

count_scopus_citations.name: count_scopus_citations
count_scopus_citations.description: Analyze the content loaded from the Wikipedia page to count how many in-text citations reference a source that was cited using Scopus.
